item.title: Rescue a Lost Commit
item.description: By some creative Git juggling, I actually managed to "lose" a commit today. Believe it or not, that was a first for me!

item.title: Manage IDEA Changelists for Bad Lines
item.description: How do you handle not committing these bits and pieces the reviewers do not want to see?
